messages.subject: Re:Hey List
messages.messageBody:
>
Pam wrote:
>>I think,** unfortunately**, that unschoolers are as human and flawed as
everyone
else. << (emphasis mine)
Susan says:
It's not unfortunate that we're human....humans are wonderful -- if not at
times acting in ways that are not helpful to this list.
Humans build relationships with integrity and character and respect by
admitting mistakes and attempting reparation if possible.
With that I'll make my apology for my own "slip of the send key"
which did nothing to create a positive atmosphere here - quite the opposite,
I'm afraid. :-( {remorse} Now I understand what it's like to regret
hitting that key in frustration ...reminds me of my occassional slips in
yelling at these darling children who gift me with their lives 24-7.
Susan
